snippet: General Manager Brian Cashman said the Yankees were willing to talk to virtually every free agent in order to address needs in pitching, catching and the outfield.
lead_paragraph: General Manager Brian Cashman said the Yankees were willing to talk to virtually every free agent in order to address needs in pitching, catching and the outfield.

headline.main: Yankees Have Many Holes to Fill, and Many Phone Calls to Make
headline.print_headline: Yankees Have Many Holes to Fill, and Many Phone Calls to Make
